'Обновить 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.Refresh() Public sub Refresh() on error resume next RowRetrived = false m_Brief ="" End sub
'Загрузить из базы данных 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.LoadFromDatabase () Public sub LoadFromDatabase () on error resume next If ID="" then exit sub If Application.WorkOffline then RowRetrived = true RetriveTime = now exit sub end if dim rs as adodb.recordset If not RowRetrived then CleanFields set rs =application.MTZSession.GetRow( PartName, id) Unpack rs m_SecureStyleID = rs!SecurityStyleID RowRetrived = true RetriveTime = now end if end sub
'Найти строку раздела в дочерних объектах 'Parameters: '[IN] StrID , тип параметра: string, '[IN] InstID , тип параметра: string - ... 'Returns: ' объект любого класса Visual Basic ' ,или Nothing 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as object ' Set variable = me.FindObject(...параметры...) public function FindObject(byval StrID as string, byval InstID as string) as object dim m_FindObject as object static inFindObject as boolean if StrID = "" then exit function if InstID = "" then exit function if inFindObject then exit function inFindObject = true if StrID = PartName then if InstID = ID then set m_FindObject=me end if end if
set FindObject = m_findobject set m_FindObject = nothing inFindObject = false end function
'Оптимизировать занятую объектом память 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.Compact() public sub Compact() if not Changed then CleanFields RowRetrived = false end if
end sub
'Регистрация изменения значения строки 'Parameters: '[IN] fieldName , тип параметра: string, '[IN] OldValue,, тип параметра: Variant '[IN][OUT] NewValue, тип параметра: Variant - ... 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.OnChange({параметры}) friend sub OnChange(byval fieldName as string, byval OldValue, byref NewValue) RaiseEvent Change(fieldname,OldValue,NewValue) end sub
'Загрузить из формата XML 'Parameters: '[IN][OUT] node , тип параметра: IXMLDOMNode, '[IN] LoadMode , тип параметра: integer=0 - ... 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.XMLLoad({параметры}) public sub XMLLoad( node as IXMLDOMNode, optional byval LoadMode as integer=0) on error resume next Dim e_list As IXMLDOMNodeList Dim e_ As IXMLDOMNode if LoadMode <>2 then m_ID=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("ID").nodeValue m_Deleted=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("Deleted").nodeValue m_IsLocked=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("IsLocked").nodeValue if m_IsLocked >2 then m_IsLocked =0 m_RetriveTime=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("RetriveTime").nodeValue m_ChangeTime=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("ChangeTime").nodeValue m_AccessTime=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("AccessTime").nodeValue if Application.workoffline and m_IsLocked = LockSession then m_IsLocked = NoLock Secure node.Attributes.getNamedItem("SECURITYSTYLEID").nodeValue set Target=nothing m_Target_ID=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("TARGET").nodeValue m_Target_ID_BRIEF=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("TARGET_BRIEF").nodeValue Code=Replace(node.Attributes.getNamedItem("CODE").nodeValue,vbLf,vbcrlf) on error goto bye 'if m_ChangeTime >= m_RetriveTime then m_Changed = true m_Changed = true m_RowRetrived = true m_Brief = "" on error resume next exit sub bye: debugoutput err.description end sub
'Сохранить в формате XML 'Parameters: '[IN][OUT] node , тип параметра: IXMLDOMElement, '[IN][OUT] xdom , тип параметра: DomDocument - ... 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.XMLSave({параметры}) public sub XMLSave(node as IXMLDOMElement, xdom as DomDocument) on error resume next Dim e_ As IXMLDOMElement LoadFromDatabase node.setAttribute "ID", m_ID node.setAttribute "Deleted", m_Deleted node.setAttribute "IsLocked", m_IsLocked node.setAttribute "RetriveTime", cdbl(m_RetriveTime) node.setAttribute "ChangeTime", cdbl(m_ChangeTime) node.setAttribute "SECURITYSTYLEID", m_SecureStyleID node.setAttribute "TARGET", m_Target_ID if not (Target is nothing) then node.setAttribute "TARGET_BRIEF", Target.BRIEF else node.setAttribute "TARGET_BRIEF", m_Target_ID_BRIEF end if node.setAttribute "CODE", Code node.setAttribute "AccessTime", cdbl(m_AccessTime) end sub
'может ли быть изменено 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'Returns: ' Boolean, семантика результата: ' true - ' false - 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as boolean ' variable = me. CanChange public property Get CanChange() as boolean if application.workoffline then CanChange = CanChangeoffLine else CanChange = canchangeonline end if end property
'может ли быть изменено в режиме Offline 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'Returns: ' Boolean, семантика результата: ' true - ' false - 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as boolean ' variable = me. CanChangeOffline public property Get CanChangeOffline() as boolean dim test as boolean if not parent is nothing then test = parent.CanChangeOffline end if if not test then test = (IsLocked = LockPermanent) end if CanChangeOffline = test end property
'может ли быть изменено в режиме ONline 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'Returns: ' Boolean, семантика результата: ' true - ' false - 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as boolean ' variable = me. CanChangeONLine public property Get CanChangeONLine() as boolean dim test as boolean if not parent is nothing then test = parent.CanChangeONLine end if if not test then test = (IsLocked < ExternalLockSession) end if CanChangeOnline = test end property
'Задать тип блокировки 'Parameters: '[IN][OUT] newIsLocked , тип параметра: LockStyle - ... 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim value as Variant ' value = ...значение... ' me. IsLocked = value friend property Let IsLocked(newIsLocked as LockStyle) m_IsLocked = newIsLocked end property
'Текущий тип блокировки 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'Returns: ' объект класса LockStyle ' ,или Nothing 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as LockStyle ' Set variable = me. IsLocked public property Get IsLocked() as LockStyle if m_IsLocked <> LockSession and m_IsLocked <> LockPermanent then CheckLock IsLocked = m_IsLocked end property
'Проверить блокировку 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.CheckLock() private sub CheckLock() static LastCheckTime as date if application.WorkOffline then exit sub If Now - LastCheckTime < CDbl(CDate("00:00:10")) Then Exit Sub On Error Resume Next m_IsLocked = Application.MTZSession.IsLocked("DINAMICFILTERSCRIPT", ID) LastCheckTime = now end sub
'Заблокировать 'Parameters: '[IN] Permanent , тип параметра: boolean=false - ... 'Returns: ' Boolean, семантика результата: ' true - ' false - 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as boolean ' variable = me.LockResource(...параметры...) public function LockResource(optional byval Permanent as boolean=false ) as boolean if application.WorkOffline then exit function dim OK ok = Application.MTZSession.LockResource("DINAMICFILTERSCRIPT", ID, Permanent) if OK then if Permanent then m_IsLocked = LockPermanent else m_IsLocked = LockSession else m_IsLocked = NoLock end if bye: end function
'Снять блокировку ресурса 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'Returns: ' Boolean, семантика результата: ' true - ' false - 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as boolean ' variable = me.UnLockResource() public function UnLockResource() as boolean if application.WorkOffline then exit function On Error GoTo bye Application.MTZSession.UnlockResource "DINAMICFILTERSCRIPT", ID m_IsLocked = NoLock bye: end function
'Возможно блокирование 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'Returns: ' Boolean, семантика результата: ' true - ' false - 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as boolean ' variable = me.CanLock() public function CanLock() as boolean if application.WorkOffline then exit function On Error Resume Next CanLock = Application.MTZSession.CanLock("DINAMICFILTERSCRIPT",ID) end function
'Массовое обновление измененных строк 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.BatchUpdate() PUBLIC sub BatchUpdate() If not Application.WorkOffline Then If Deleted Then Delete Exit Sub End If If Changed Then Save End If End sub
'Загрузить все данные документа из базы 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.LoadAll() friend sub LoadAll() If not Application.WorkOffline Then LoadFromDatabase End If End sub
'Раскрытие раздела при выборе узла в глобальном дереве 'Parameters: '[IN][OUT] tree , тип параметра: object, '[IN] key , тип параметра: string, '[IN] mode , тип параметра: string, '[IN][OUT] optional Mask , тип параметра: string = "" - ... 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.Expand({параметры}) public sub Expand(tree as object,byval key as string, byval mode as string, optional Mask as string = "") dim id as string , struct as string, child as string dim item as object, i as long, nid as string, tmpid as string dim tidx as long, tid as string 'only for tree styled structure on error resume next id = mid(key,39,38) struct = right(tree.nodes.item(key).parent.parent.key,len(tree.nodes.item(key).parent.parent.key)-76) child = right(key,len(key)-76) if id<>m_id then exit sub else set item =me end if tree.nodes.item(key).sorted=true if mode="" then select case child end select end if ' mode="" (Default) end sub

'строка раздела Описание источника данных для полей типа ReferenceSQL private m_ID as string private m_SecureStyleID as string private m_RowRetrived as boolean private m_Changed as boolean private m_Deleted as boolean private m_RetriveTime as date private m_ChangeTime as date private m_AccessTime as date private m_Parent as Object private m_Application as Application private m_Provider as String private m_ConnectionString as String private m_DataSource as String private m_IDField as String private m_BriefString as String private m_FilterString as String private m_SortField as String private m_DescriptionString as STRING private m_DontShowDialog as enumYesNo private m_Brief as string
'Сообщение об изменении строки 'Parameters: '[IN] fieldName , тип параметра: string, '[IN] OldValue,, тип параметра: Variant '[IN][OUT] NewValue, тип параметра: Variant - ... 'Returns: ' объект любого класса Visual Basic ' ,или Nothing ' ,или значение любого скалярного типа 'See Also: 'Example: Public Event Change( byval fieldName as string, byval OldValue, byref NewValue) private m_IsLocked as LockStyle

RetriveTime = value friend property Let RetriveTime(newRetriveTime as date) m_RetriveTime = newRetriveTime end property
'Дата и время считывания из базы 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'Returns: ' значение типа date 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as date ' variable = me. RetriveTime public property Get RetriveTime() as date RetriveTime = m_RetriveTime end property
'Задать Дату и время изменения 'Parameters: '[IN][OUT] newChangeTime , тип параметра: date - ... 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim value as Variant ' value = ...значение... ' me. ChangeTime = value friend property Let ChangeTime(newChangeTime as date) m_ChangeTime = newChangeTime end property
'Получить Дату и время изменения 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'Returns: ' значение типа date 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as date ' variable = me. ChangeTime public property Get ChangeTime() as date ChangeTime = m_ChangeTime end property
'Задать время обращения 'Parameters: '[IN][OUT] newAccessTime , тип параметра: date - ... 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim value as Variant ' value = ...значение... ' me. AccessTime = value friend property Let AccessTime(newAccessTime as date) m_AccessTime = newAccessTime if m_AccessTime <= m_RetriveTime then m_AccessTime = m_RetriveTime +0.001 end property
'Получить время обращения 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'Returns: ' значение типа date 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as date ' variable = me. AccessTime public property Get AccessTime() as date AccessTime = m_AccessTime end property private function GetFromXML(ByVal XML as string, ByVal TagName as string) as string Dim res As String On Error GoTo err Dim XMLDoc As New DOMDocument Call XMLDoc.loadXML(XML) Dim Node As MSXML2.IXMLDOMNode For Each Node In XMLDoc.childNodes.item(0).childNodes If (UCase(Node.baseName) = "BRIEF") Then res = Node.Text Exit For End If Next err: GetFromXML = res End function ' let 'Провайдер

m_Provider= newValue end if end property

m_IDField= newValue end if end property

DontShowDialog = m_DontShowDialog end property
'Упаковать поля в именованную коллекцию 'Parameters: '[IN][OUT] nv , тип параметра: NamedValues - ... 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.Pack({параметры}) public sub Pack(byref nv as NamedValues) dim nvi as NamedValue set nv = Nothing set nv = new NamedValues
set nvi=nv.Add( "Provider",m_Provider) nvi.ValueSize = 128 set nvi=nv.Add( "ConnectionString",m_ConnectionString) nvi.ValueSize = 512 set nvi=nv.Add( "DataSource",m_DataSource) nvi.ValueSize = 512 set nvi=nv.Add( "IDField",m_IDField) nvi.ValueSize = 128 set nvi=nv.Add( "BriefString",m_BriefString) nvi.ValueSize = 512 set nvi=nv.Add( "FilterString",m_FilterString) nvi.ValueSize = 512 set nvi=nv.Add( "SortField",m_SortField) nvi.ValueSize = 512 set nvi=nv.Add( "DescriptionString",m_DescriptionString) set nvi=nv.Add( "DontShowDialog",m_DontShowDialog) nvi.ValueType = adInteger end sub
'Краткое название строки 'Parameters: '[IN] UseServer , тип параметра: boolean = false - ... 'Returns: ' значение типа string 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as string ' variable = me. Brief(...параметры...) public function Brief( optional byval UseServer as boolean = false) as string dim s as string if Application.WorkOffline then
m_BRIEF="" m_BRIEF= m_BRIEF & DataSource & "; " BRIEF= m_BRIEF else on error goto bye if UseServer or m_Brief="" then application.MTZSession.GetBrief PartName, ID, s if len(s) > 255 then Brief = left(s,255) & "..." else Brief = s end if m_Brief = Brief else Brief = m_Brief end if end if exit function bye: Brief = "! доступ запрещен ! (" & err.description & ")" end function
'Распаковать значения полей из именованной коллекции 'Parameters: '[IN][OUT] nv , тип параметра: object - ... 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.UnPack({параметры}) public sub UnPack(byref nv as object) on error resume next if typename(nv) = "NamedValues" then
m_Provider=nv.item( "Provider").Value m_ConnectionString=nv.item( "ConnectionString").Value m_DataSource=nv.item( "DataSource").Value m_IDField=nv.item( "IDField").Value m_BriefString=nv.item( "BriefString").Value m_FilterString=nv.item( "FilterString").Value m_SortField=nv.item( "SortField").Value m_DescriptionString=nv.item( "DescriptionString").Value m_DontShowDialog=nv.item( "DontShowDialog").Value else
m_Provider=nv.fields( "Provider").Value m_ConnectionString=nv.fields( "ConnectionString").Value m_DataSource=nv.fields( "DataSource").Value m_IDField=nv.fields( "IDField").Value m_BriefString=nv.fields( "BriefString").Value m_FilterString=nv.fields( "FilterString").Value m_SortField=nv.fields( "SortField").Value m_DescriptionString=nv.fields( "DescriptionString").Value m_DontShowDialog=nv.fields( "DontShowDialog").Value end if end sub
'Очистить поля 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.CleanFields() Public Sub CleanFields() dim nv as namedvalues dim o as FIELDSRCDEF set o = new FIELDSRCDEF set o.Application = me.Application set o.parent = me.parent o.pack nv unpack nv set o = nothing end sub
'Сохранить изменение 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'Returns: ' Boolean, семантика результата: ' true - ' false - 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as boolean ' variable = me.Save() Public Function Save() as boolean LoadFromDatabase if Application.WorkOffline then exit function If Not CanChangeONLine Then Exit Function dim nv as namedvalues pack nv on error goto bye application.MTZSession.SaveRow2 PartName, id, me.Parent.Parent.id ,nv,application.id Changed = false Save = true exit function bye: err.raise err.number,"FIELDSRCDEF.Save",err.description End Function
'Удалить строку 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'Returns: ' Boolean, семантика результата: ' true - ' false - 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as boolean ' variable = me.Delete() Public Function Delete() as boolean Dim i As Long, ok as boolean if Application.WorkOffline then If Not CanChangeOffLine Then Exit Function on error goto bye m_Deleted = True Delete = True else If Not CanChangeONLine Then Exit Function Delete=application.MTZSession.DeleteRow2( PartName, id, Application.ID) Changed = false 'Compact Closeclass end if exit function bye: err.raise err.number,"FIELDSRCDEF.Delete",err.description End Function
'Задать стиль защиты 'Parameters: '[IN] SecurityStyleID , тип параметра: string - ... 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.Secure({параметры}) public sub Secure(byval SecurityStyleID as string) if application.WorkOffline then exit sub On Error goto bye M_SecureStyleID =Application.MTZSession.Secure("FIELDSRCDEF" ,ID,SecurityStyleID) exit sub bye: err.raise err.number,"FIELDSRCDEF.Secure",err.description end sub
'Распространить права на дочерние строки и разделы 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.Propagate() public sub Propagate() if application.WorkOffline then exit sub Application.MTZSession.Propagate "FIELDSRCDEF", ID exit sub bye: err.raise err.number,"FIELDSRCDEF.Propagate",err.description end sub
'Деструктор 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.CloseClass() Friend sub CloseClass() on error resume next
if not Application is nothing then Application.Logger.Message "FIELDSRCDEF.CloseClass" CloseParents end sub
'Обновить 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.Refresh() Public sub Refresh() on error resume next RowRetrived = false m_Brief ="" End sub
'Загрузить из базы данных 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.LoadFromDatabase () Public sub LoadFromDatabase () on error resume next If ID="" then exit sub If Application.WorkOffline then RowRetrived = true RetriveTime = now exit sub end if dim rs as adodb.recordset If not RowRetrived then CleanFields set rs =application.MTZSession.GetRow( PartName, id) Unpack rs m_SecureStyleID = rs!SecurityStyleID RowRetrived = true RetriveTime = now end if end sub
'Найти строку раздела в дочерних объектах 'Parameters: '[IN] StrID , тип параметра: string, '[IN] InstID , тип параметра: string - ... 'Returns: ' объект любого класса Visual Basic ' ,или Nothing 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as object ' Set variable = me.FindObject(...параметры...) public function FindObject(byval StrID as string, byval InstID as string) as object dim m_FindObject as object static inFindObject as boolean if StrID = "" then exit function if InstID = "" then exit function if inFindObject then exit function inFindObject = true if StrID = PartName then if InstID = ID then set m_FindObject=me end if end if
set FindObject = m_findobject set m_FindObject = nothing inFindObject = false end function
'Оптимизировать занятую объектом память 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.Compact() public sub Compact() if not Changed then CleanFields RowRetrived = false end if
end sub
'Регистрация изменения значения строки 'Parameters: '[IN] fieldName , тип параметра: string, '[IN] OldValue,, тип параметра: Variant '[IN][OUT] NewValue, тип параметра: Variant - ... 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.OnChange({параметры}) friend sub OnChange(byval fieldName as string, byval OldValue, byref NewValue) RaiseEvent Change(fieldname,OldValue,NewValue) end sub
'Загрузить из формата XML 'Parameters: '[IN][OUT] node , тип параметра: IXMLDOMNode, '[IN] LoadMode , тип параметра: integer=0 - ... 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.XMLLoad({параметры}) public sub XMLLoad( node as IXMLDOMNode, optional byval LoadMode as integer=0) on error resume next Dim e_list As IXMLDOMNodeList Dim e_ As IXMLDOMNode if LoadMode <>2 then m_ID=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("ID").nodeValue m_Deleted=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("Deleted").nodeValue m_IsLocked=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("IsLocked").nodeValue if m_IsLocked >2 then m_IsLocked =0 m_RetriveTime=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("RetriveTime").nodeValue m_ChangeTime=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("ChangeTime").nodeValue m_AccessTime=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("AccessTime").nodeValue if Application.workoffline and m_IsLocked = LockSession then m_IsLocked = NoLock Secure node.Attributes.getNamedItem("SECURITYSTYLEID").nodeValue Provider=Replace(node.Attributes.getNamedItem("PROVIDER").nodeValue,vbLf,vbcrlf) ConnectionString=Replace(node.Attributes.getNamedItem("CONNECTIONSTRING").nodeValue,vbLf,vbcrlf) DataSource=Replace(node.Attributes.getNamedItem("DATASOURCE").nodeValue,vbLf,vbcrlf) IDField=Replace(node.Attributes.getNamedItem("IDFIELD").nodeValue,vbLf,vbcrlf) BriefString=Replace(node.Attributes.getNamedItem("BRIEFSTRING").nodeValue,vbLf,vbcrlf) FilterString=Replace(node.Attributes.getNamedItem("FILTERSTRING").nodeValue,vbLf,vbcrlf) SortField=Replace(node.Attributes.getNamedItem("SORTFIELD").nodeValue,vbLf,vbcrlf) DescriptionString=Replace(node.Attributes.getNamedItem("DESCRIPTIONSTRING").nodeValue,vbLf,vbcrlf) DontShowDialog=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("DONTSHOWDIALOG").nodeValue on error goto bye 'if m_ChangeTime >= m_RetriveTime then m_Changed = true m_Changed = true m_RowRetrived = true m_Brief = "" on error resume next exit sub bye: debugoutput err.description end sub
'Сохранить в формате XML 'Parameters: '[IN][OUT] node , тип параметра: IXMLDOMElement, '[IN][OUT] xdom , тип параметра: DomDocument - ... 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.XMLSave({параметры}) public sub XMLSave(node as IXMLDOMElement, xdom as DomDocument) on error resume next Dim e_ As IXMLDOMElement LoadFromDatabase node.setAttribute "ID", m_ID node.setAttribute "Deleted", m_Deleted node.setAttribute "IsLocked", m_IsLocked node.setAttribute "RetriveTime", cdbl(m_RetriveTime) node.setAttribute "ChangeTime", cdbl(m_ChangeTime) node.setAttribute "SECURITYSTYLEID", m_SecureStyleID node.setAttribute "PROVIDER", Provider node.setAttribute "CONNECTIONSTRING", ConnectionString node.setAttribute "DATASOURCE", DataSource node.setAttribute "IDFIELD", IDField node.setAttribute "BRIEFSTRING", BriefString node.setAttribute "FILTERSTRING", FilterString node.setAttribute "SORTFIELD", SortField node.setAttribute "DESCRIPTIONSTRING", DescriptionString node.setAttribute "DONTSHOWDIALOG", DontShowDialog node.setAttribute "AccessTime", cdbl(m_AccessTime) end sub
'может ли быть изменено 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'Returns: ' Boolean, семантика результата: ' true - ' false - 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as boolean ' variable = me. CanChange public property Get CanChange() as boolean if application.workoffline then CanChange = CanChangeoffLine else CanChange = canchangeonline end if end property
'может ли быть изменено в режиме Offline 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'Returns: ' Boolean, семантика результата: ' true - ' false - 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as boolean ' variable = me. CanChangeOffline public property Get CanChangeOffline() as boolean dim test as boolean if not parent is nothing then test = parent.CanChangeOffline end if if not test then test = (IsLocked = LockPermanent) end if CanChangeOffline = test end property
'может ли быть изменено в режиме ONline 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'Returns: ' Boolean, семантика результата: ' true - ' false - 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as boolean ' variable = me. CanChangeONLine public property Get CanChangeONLine() as boolean dim test as boolean if not parent is nothing then test = parent.CanChangeONLine end if if not test then test = (IsLocked < ExternalLockSession) end if CanChangeOnline = test end property
'Задать тип блокировки 'Parameters: '[IN][OUT] newIsLocked , тип параметра: LockStyle - ... 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim value as Variant ' value = ...значение... ' me. IsLocked = value friend property Let IsLocked(newIsLocked as LockStyle) m_IsLocked = newIsLocked end property
'Текущий тип блокировки 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'Returns: ' объект класса LockStyle ' ,или Nothing 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as LockStyle ' Set variable = me. IsLocked public property Get IsLocked() as LockStyle if m_IsLocked <> LockSession and m_IsLocked <> LockPermanent then CheckLock IsLocked = m_IsLocked end property
'Проверить блокировку 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.CheckLock() private sub CheckLock() static LastCheckTime as date if application.WorkOffline then exit sub If Now - LastCheckTime < CDbl(CDate("00:00:10")) Then Exit Sub On Error Resume Next m_IsLocked = Application.MTZSession.IsLocked("FIELDSRCDEF", ID) LastCheckTime = now end sub
'Заблокировать 'Parameters: '[IN] Permanent , тип параметра: boolean=false - ... 'Returns: ' Boolean, семантика результата: ' true - ' false - 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as boolean ' variable = me.LockResource(...параметры...) public function LockResource(optional byval Permanent as boolean=false ) as boolean if application.WorkOffline then exit function dim OK ok = Application.MTZSession.LockResource("FIELDSRCDEF", ID, Permanent) if OK then if Permanent then m_IsLocked = LockPermanent else m_IsLocked = LockSession else m_IsLocked = NoLock end if bye: end function
'Снять блокировку ресурса 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'Returns: ' Boolean, семантика результата: ' true - ' false - 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as boolean ' variable = me.UnLockResource() public function UnLockResource() as boolean if application.WorkOffline then exit function On Error GoTo bye Application.MTZSession.UnlockResource "FIELDSRCDEF", ID m_IsLocked = NoLock bye: end function
'Возможно блокирование 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'Returns: ' Boolean, семантика результата: ' true - ' false - 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as boolean ' variable = me.CanLock() public function CanLock() as boolean if application.WorkOffline then exit function On Error Resume Next CanLock = Application.MTZSession.CanLock("FIELDSRCDEF",ID) end function
'Массовое обновление измененных строк 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.BatchUpdate() PUBLIC sub BatchUpdate() If not Application.WorkOffline Then If Deleted Then Delete Exit Sub End If If Changed Then Save End If End sub
'Загрузить все данные документа из базы 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.LoadAll() friend sub LoadAll() If not Application.WorkOffline Then LoadFromDatabase End If End sub
'Раскрытие раздела при выборе узла в глобальном дереве 'Parameters: '[IN][OUT] tree , тип параметра: object, '[IN] key , тип параметра: string, '[IN] mode , тип параметра: string, '[IN][OUT] optional Mask , тип параметра: string = "" - ... 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.Expand({параметры}) public sub Expand(tree as object,byval key as string, byval mode as string, optional Mask as string = "") dim id as string , struct as string, child as string dim item as object, i as long, nid as string, tmpid as string dim tidx as long, tid as string 'only for tree styled structure on error resume next id = mid(key,39,38) struct = right(tree.nodes.item(key).parent.parent.key,len(tree.nodes.item(key).parent.parent.key)-76) child = right(key,len(key)-76) if id<>m_id then exit sub else set item =me end if tree.nodes.item(key).sorted=true if mode="" then select case child end select end if ' mode="" (Default) end sub

'Задать время обращения 'Parameters: '[IN][OUT] newAccessTime , тип параметра: date - ... 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim value as Variant ' value = ...значение... ' me. AccessTime = value friend property Let AccessTime(newAccessTime as date) m_AccessTime = newAccessTime if m_AccessTime <= m_RetriveTime then m_AccessTime = m_RetriveTime +0.001 end property
'Получить время обращения 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'Returns: ' значение типа date 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as date ' variable = me. AccessTime public property Get AccessTime() as date AccessTime = m_AccessTime end property private function GetFromXML(ByVal XML as string, ByVal TagName as string) as string Dim res As String On Error GoTo err Dim XMLDoc As New DOMDocument Call XMLDoc.loadXML(XML) Dim Node As MSXML2.IXMLDOMNode For Each Node In XMLDoc.childNodes.item(0).childNodes If (UCase(Node.baseName) = "BRIEF") Then res = Node.Text Exit For End If Next err: GetFromXML = res End function

ViewColumn (...параметры...) public property Get ViewColumn (optional byval Refresh as boolean = true) as ViewColumn_col if m_ViewColumn is nothing then set m_ViewColumn = new ViewColumn_col set m_ViewColumn.Parent = me set m_ViewColumn.Application = me.Application if Refresh then m_ViewColumn.Refresh end if set ViewColumn = m_ViewColumn end property

'Упаковать поля в именованную коллекцию 'Parameters: '[IN][OUT] nv , тип параметра: NamedValues - ... 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.Pack({параметры}) public sub Pack(byref nv as NamedValues) dim nvi as NamedValue set nv = Nothing set nv = new NamedValues
set nvi=nv.Add( "Name",m_Name) nvi.ValueSize = 255 set nvi=nv.Add( "the_Alias",m_the_Alias) nvi.ValueSize = 64 set nvi=nv.Add( "ForChoose",m_ForChoose) nvi.ValueType = adInteger set nvi=nv.Add( "FilterField0",m_FilterField0) nvi.ValueSize = 255 set nvi=nv.Add( "FilterField1",m_FilterField1) nvi.ValueSize = 255 set nvi=nv.Add( "FilterField2",m_FilterField2) nvi.ValueSize = 255 set nvi=nv.Add( "FilterField3",m_FilterField3) nvi.ValueSize = 255 end sub
'Краткое название строки 'Parameters: '[IN] UseServer , тип параметра: boolean = false - ... 'Returns: ' значение типа string 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as string ' variable = me. Brief(...параметры...) public function Brief( optional byval UseServer as boolean = false) as string dim s as string if Application.WorkOffline then
m_BRIEF="" m_BRIEF= m_BRIEF & Name & "; " BRIEF= m_BRIEF else on error goto bye if UseServer or m_Brief="" then application.MTZSession.GetBrief PartName, ID, s if len(s) > 255 then Brief = left(s,255) & "..." else Brief = s end if m_Brief = Brief else Brief = m_Brief end if end if exit function bye: Brief = "! доступ запрещен ! (" & err.description & ")" end function
'Распаковать значения полей из именованной коллекции 'Parameters: '[IN][OUT] nv , тип параметра: object - ... 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.UnPack({параметры}) public sub UnPack(byref nv as object) on error resume next if typename(nv) = "NamedValues" then
m_Name=nv.item( "Name").Value m_the_Alias=nv.item( "the_Alias").Value m_ForChoose=nv.item( "ForChoose").Value m_FilterField0=nv.item( "FilterField0").Value m_FilterField1=nv.item( "FilterField1").Value m_FilterField2=nv.item( "FilterField2").Value m_FilterField3=nv.item( "FilterField3").Value else
m_Name=nv.fields( "Name").Value m_the_Alias=nv.fields( "the_Alias").Value m_ForChoose=nv.fields( "ForChoose").Value m_FilterField0=nv.fields( "FilterField0").Value m_FilterField1=nv.fields( "FilterField1").Value m_FilterField2=nv.fields( "FilterField2").Value m_FilterField3=nv.fields( "FilterField3").Value end if end sub
'Очистить поля 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.CleanFields() Public Sub CleanFields() dim nv as namedvalues dim o as PARTVIEW set o = new PARTVIEW set o.Application = me.Application set o.parent = me.parent o.pack nv unpack nv set o = nothing end sub
'Сохранить изменение 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'Returns: ' Boolean, семантика результата: ' true - ' false - 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as boolean ' variable = me.Save() Public Function Save() as boolean LoadFromDatabase if Application.WorkOffline then exit function If Not CanChangeONLine Then Exit Function dim nv as namedvalues pack nv on error goto bye application.MTZSession.SaveRow2 PartName, id, me.Parent.Parent.id ,nv,application.id Changed = false Save = true exit function bye: err.raise err.number,"PARTVIEW.Save",err.description End Function
'Удалить строку 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'Returns: ' Boolean, семантика результата: ' true - ' false - 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as boolean ' variable = me.Delete() Public Function Delete() as boolean Dim i As Long, ok as boolean if Application.WorkOffline then If Not CanChangeOffLine Then Exit Function on error goto bye m_Deleted = True Delete = True else If Not CanChangeONLine Then Exit Function Delete=application.MTZSession.DeleteRow2( PartName, id, Application.ID) Changed = false 'Compact Closeclass end if exit function bye: err.raise err.number,"PARTVIEW.Delete",err.description End Function
'Задать стиль защиты 'Parameters: '[IN] SecurityStyleID , тип параметра: string - ... 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.Secure({параметры}) public sub Secure(byval SecurityStyleID as string) if application.WorkOffline then exit sub On Error goto bye M_SecureStyleID =Application.MTZSession.Secure("PARTVIEW" ,ID,SecurityStyleID) exit sub bye: err.raise err.number,"PARTVIEW.Secure",err.description end sub
'Распространить права на дочерние строки и разделы 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.Propagate() public sub Propagate() if application.WorkOffline then exit sub Application.MTZSession.Propagate "PARTVIEW", ID exit sub bye: err.raise err.number,"PARTVIEW.Propagate",err.description end sub
'Деструктор 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.CloseClass() Friend sub CloseClass() on error resume next
if not m_ViewColumn is nothing then m_ViewColumn.CloseClass set m_ViewColumn = nothing end if if not m_PARTVIEW_LNK is nothing then m_PARTVIEW_LNK.CloseClass set m_PARTVIEW_LNK = nothing end if if not Application is nothing then Application.Logger.Message "PARTVIEW.CloseClass" CloseParents end sub
'Обновить 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.Refresh() Public sub Refresh() on error resume next RowRetrived = false m_Brief ="" End sub
'Загрузить из базы данных 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.LoadFromDatabase () Public sub LoadFromDatabase () on error resume next If ID="" then exit sub If Application.WorkOffline then RowRetrived = true RetriveTime = now exit sub end if dim rs as adodb.recordset If not RowRetrived then CleanFields set rs =application.MTZSession.GetRow( PartName, id) Unpack rs m_SecureStyleID = rs!SecurityStyleID RowRetrived = true RetriveTime = now end if end sub
'Найти строку раздела в дочерних объектах 'Parameters: '[IN] StrID , тип параметра: string, '[IN] InstID , тип параметра: string - ... 'Returns: ' объект любого класса Visual Basic ' ,или Nothing 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as object ' Set variable = me.FindObject(...параметры...) public function FindObject(byval StrID as string, byval InstID as string) as object dim m_FindObject as object static inFindObject as boolean if StrID = "" then exit function if InstID = "" then exit function if inFindObject then exit function inFindObject = true if StrID = PartName then if InstID = ID then set m_FindObject=me end if end if
if m_FindObject is nothing then set m_FindObject = ViewColumn.FindObject(StrID,InstID) end if if m_FindObject is nothing then set m_FindObject = PARTVIEW_LNK.FindObject(StrID,InstID) end if set FindObject = m_findobject set m_FindObject = nothing inFindObject = false end function
'Оптимизировать занятую объектом память 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.Compact() public sub Compact() if not Changed then CleanFields RowRetrived = false end if
ViewColumn.Compact PARTVIEW_LNK.Compact end sub
'Регистрация изменения значения строки 'Parameters: '[IN] fieldName , тип параметра: string, '[IN] OldValue,, тип параметра: Variant '[IN][OUT] NewValue, тип параметра: Variant - ... 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.OnChange({параметры}) friend sub OnChange(byval fieldName as string, byval OldValue, byref NewValue) RaiseEvent Change(fieldname,OldValue,NewValue) end sub
'Загрузить из формата XML 'Parameters: '[IN][OUT] node , тип параметра: IXMLDOMNode, '[IN] LoadMode , тип параметра: integer=0 - ... 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.XMLLoad({параметры}) public sub XMLLoad( node as IXMLDOMNode, optional byval LoadMode as integer=0) on error resume next Dim e_list As IXMLDOMNodeList Dim e_ As IXMLDOMNode if LoadMode <>2 then m_ID=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("ID").nodeValue m_Deleted=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("Deleted").nodeValue m_IsLocked=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("IsLocked").nodeValue if m_IsLocked >2 then m_IsLocked =0 m_RetriveTime=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("RetriveTime").nodeValue m_ChangeTime=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("ChangeTime").nodeValue m_AccessTime=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("AccessTime").nodeValue if Application.workoffline and m_IsLocked = LockSession then m_IsLocked = NoLock Secure node.Attributes.getNamedItem("SECURITYSTYLEID").nodeValue Name=Replace(node.Attributes.getNamedItem("NAME").nodeValue,vbLf,vbcrlf) the_Alias=Replace(node.Attributes.getNamedItem("THE_ALIAS").nodeValue,vbLf,vbcrlf) ForChoose=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("FORCHOOSE").nodeValue FilterField0=Replace(node.Attributes.getNamedItem("FILTERFIELD0").nodeValue,vbLf,vbcrlf) FilterField1=Replace(node.Attributes.getNamedItem("FILTERFIELD1").nodeValue,vbLf,vbcrlf) FilterField2=Replace(node.Attributes.getNamedItem("FILTERFIELD2").nodeValue,vbLf,vbcrlf) FilterField3=Replace(node.Attributes.getNamedItem("FILTERFIELD3").nodeValue,vbLf,vbcrlf) on error goto bye 'if m_ChangeTime >= m_RetriveTime then m_Changed = true m_Changed = true m_RowRetrived = true m_Brief = "" on error resume next Set e_list = node.selectNodes("VIEWCOLUMN_COL") ViewColumn.XMLLoad e_list, LoadMode Set e_list = node.selectNodes("PARTVIEW_LNK_COL") PARTVIEW_LNK.XMLLoad e_list, LoadMode exit sub bye: debugoutput err.description end sub
'Сохранить в формате XML 'Parameters: '[IN][OUT] node , тип параметра: IXMLDOMElement, '[IN][OUT] xdom , тип параметра: DomDocument - ... 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.XMLSave({параметры}) public sub XMLSave(node as IXMLDOMElement, xdom as DomDocument) on error resume next Dim e_ As IXMLDOMElement LoadFromDatabase node.setAttribute "ID", m_ID node.setAttribute "Deleted", m_Deleted node.setAttribute "IsLocked", m_IsLocked node.setAttribute "RetriveTime", cdbl(m_RetriveTime) node.setAttribute "ChangeTime", cdbl(m_ChangeTime) node.setAttribute "SECURITYSTYLEID", m_SecureStyleID node.setAttribute "NAME", Name node.setAttribute "THE_ALIAS", the_Alias node.setAttribute "FORCHOOSE", ForChoose node.setAttribute "FILTERFIELD0", FilterField0 node.setAttribute "FILTERFIELD1", FilterField1 node.setAttribute "FILTERFIELD2", FilterField2 node.setAttribute "FILTERFIELD3", FilterField3 node.setAttribute "AccessTime", cdbl(m_AccessTime) ViewColumn.XMLSave node,xdom PARTVIEW_LNK.XMLSave node,xdom end sub
'может ли быть изменено 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'Returns: ' Boolean, семантика результата: ' true - ' false - 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as boolean ' variable = me. CanChange public property Get CanChange() as boolean if application.workoffline then CanChange = CanChangeoffLine else CanChange = canchangeonline end if end property
'может ли быть изменено в режиме Offline 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'Returns: ' Boolean, семантика результата: ' true - ' false - 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as boolean ' variable = me. CanChangeOffline public property Get CanChangeOffline() as boolean dim test as boolean if not parent is nothing then test = parent.CanChangeOffline end if if not test then test = (IsLocked = LockPermanent) end if CanChangeOffline = test end property
'может ли быть изменено в режиме ONline 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'Returns: ' Boolean, семантика результата: ' true - ' false - 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as boolean ' variable = me. CanChangeONLine public property Get CanChangeONLine() as boolean dim test as boolean if not parent is nothing then test = parent.CanChangeONLine end if if not test then test = (IsLocked < ExternalLockSession) end if CanChangeOnline = test end property
'Задать тип блокировки 'Parameters: '[IN][OUT] newIsLocked , тип параметра: LockStyle - ... 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim value as Variant ' value = ...значение... ' me. IsLocked = value friend property Let IsLocked(newIsLocked as LockStyle) m_IsLocked = newIsLocked end property
'Текущий тип блокировки 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'Returns: ' объект класса LockStyle ' ,или Nothing 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as LockStyle ' Set variable = me. IsLocked public property Get IsLocked() as LockStyle if m_IsLocked <> LockSession and m_IsLocked <> LockPermanent then CheckLock IsLocked = m_IsLocked end property
'Проверить блокировку 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.CheckLock() private sub CheckLock() static LastCheckTime as date if application.WorkOffline then exit sub If Now - LastCheckTime < CDbl(CDate("00:00:10")) Then Exit Sub On Error Resume Next m_IsLocked = Application.MTZSession.IsLocked("PARTVIEW", ID) LastCheckTime = now end sub
'Заблокировать 'Parameters: '[IN] Permanent , тип параметра: boolean=false - ... 'Returns: ' Boolean, семантика результата: ' true - ' false - 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as boolean ' variable = me.LockResource(...параметры...) public function LockResource(optional byval Permanent as boolean=false ) as boolean if application.WorkOffline then exit function dim OK ok = Application.MTZSession.LockResource("PARTVIEW", ID, Permanent) if OK then if Permanent then m_IsLocked = LockPermanent else m_IsLocked = LockSession else m_IsLocked = NoLock end if bye: end function
'Снять блокировку ресурса 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'Returns: ' Boolean, семантика результата: ' true - ' false - 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as boolean ' variable = me.UnLockResource() public function UnLockResource() as boolean if application.WorkOffline then exit function On Error GoTo bye Application.MTZSession.UnlockResource "PARTVIEW", ID m_IsLocked = NoLock bye: end function
'Возможно блокирование 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'Returns: ' Boolean, семантика результата: ' true - ' false - 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as boolean ' variable = me.CanLock() public function CanLock() as boolean if application.WorkOffline then exit function On Error Resume Next CanLock = Application.MTZSession.CanLock("PARTVIEW",ID) end function
'Массовое обновление измененных строк 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.BatchUpdate() PUBLIC sub BatchUpdate() If not Application.WorkOffline Then If Deleted Then Delete Exit Sub End If If Changed Then Save ViewColumn.BatchUpdate PARTVIEW_LNK.BatchUpdate End If End sub
'Загрузить все данные документа из базы 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.LoadAll() friend sub LoadAll() If not Application.WorkOffline Then LoadFromDatabase ViewColumn.LoadAll PARTVIEW_LNK.LoadAll End If End sub
'Раскрытие раздела при выборе узла в глобальном дереве 'Parameters: '[IN][OUT] tree , тип параметра: object, '[IN] key , тип параметра: string, '[IN] mode , тип параметра: string, '[IN][OUT] optional Mask , тип параметра: string = "" - ... 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.Expand({параметры}) public sub Expand(tree as object,byval key as string, byval mode as string, optional Mask as string = "") dim id as string , struct as string, child as string dim item as object, i as long, nid as string, tmpid as string dim tidx as long, tid as string 'only for tree styled structure on error resume next id = mid(key,39,38) struct = right(tree.nodes.item(key).parent.parent.key,len(tree.nodes.item(key).parent.parent.key)-76) child = right(key,len(key)-76) if id<>m_id then exit sub else set item =me end if tree.nodes.item(key).sorted=true if mode="" then select case child case "ViewColumn" item.ViewColumn.refresh for i=1 to item.ViewColumn.count nid =createguid2() & item.ViewColumn.item(i).id tree.nodes.add( key,4,nid, item.ViewColumn.item(i).brief(true)).tag="Row" next case "PARTVIEW_LNK" item.PARTVIEW_LNK.refresh for i=1 to item.PARTVIEW_LNK.count nid =createguid2() & item.PARTVIEW_LNK.item(i).id tree.nodes.add( key,4,nid, item.PARTVIEW_LNK.item(i).brief(true)).tag="Row" next end select end if ' mode="" (Default) end sub

RetriveTime = value friend property Let RetriveTime(newRetriveTime as date) m_RetriveTime = newRetriveTime end property

'Задать Дату и время изменения 'Parameters: '[IN][OUT] newChangeTime , тип параметра: date - ... 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim value as Variant ' value = ...значение... ' me. ChangeTime = value friend property Let ChangeTime(newChangeTime as date) m_ChangeTime = newChangeTime end property
'Получить Дату и время изменения 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'Returns: ' значение типа date 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as date ' variable = me. ChangeTime public property Get ChangeTime() as date ChangeTime = m_ChangeTime end property
'Задать время обращения 'Parameters: '[IN][OUT] newAccessTime , тип параметра: date - ... 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim value as Variant ' value = ...значение... ' me. AccessTime = value friend property Let AccessTime(newAccessTime as date) m_AccessTime = newAccessTime if m_AccessTime <= m_RetriveTime then m_AccessTime = m_RetriveTime +0.001 end property
'Получить время обращения 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'Returns: ' значение типа date 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as date ' variable = me. AccessTime public property Get AccessTime() as date AccessTime = m_AccessTime end property private function GetFromXML(ByVal XML as string, ByVal TagName as string) as string Dim res As String On Error GoTo err Dim XMLDoc As New DOMDocument Call XMLDoc.loadXML(XML) Dim Node As MSXML2.IXMLDOMNode For Each Node In XMLDoc.childNodes.item(0).childNodes If (UCase(Node.baseName) = "BRIEF") Then res = Node.Text Exit For End If Next err: GetFromXML = res End function ' let '№
'№ 'Parameters: '[IN] newValue , тип параметра: long - ... 'Returns: ' объект любого класса Visual Basic ' ,или Nothing ' ,или значение любого скалярного типа 'See Also: 'Example: Public property let sequence(byval newValue as long) LoadFromDatabase if CanChange then ChangeTime=Now Changed=true OnChange "sequence",sequence,newvalue
m_sequence= newValue end if end property
'№ 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'Returns: ' значение типа long 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as long ' variable = me. sequence public property Get sequence() as long LoadFromDatabase AccessTime=Now
sequence = m_sequence end property ' let 'Название

'Returns: ' объект любого класса Visual Basic ' ,или Nothing ' ,или значение любого скалярного типа 'See Also: 'Example: Public property let Name(byval newValue as String) LoadFromDatabase if CanChange then ChangeTime=Now Changed=true OnChange "Name",Name,newvalue
m_Name= newValue end if end property
'Название 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'Returns: ' значение типа String 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as String ' variable = me. Name public property Get Name() as String LoadFromDatabase AccessTime=Now
Name = m_Name end property ' let 'Псвдоним
'Псвдоним 'Parameters: '[IN] newValue , тип параметра: String - ... 'Returns: ' объект любого класса Visual Basic ' ,или Nothing ' ,или значение любого скалярного типа 'See Also: 'Example: Public property let the_Alias(byval newValue as String) LoadFromDatabase if CanChange then ChangeTime=Now Changed=true OnChange "the_Alias",the_Alias,newvalue
m_the_Alias= newValue end if end property
'Псвдоним 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'Returns: ' значение типа String 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as String ' variable = me. the_Alias public property Get the_Alias() as String LoadFromDatabase AccessTime=Now
the_Alias = m_the_Alias end property ' let 'Раздел

'Returns: ' объект любого класса Visual Basic ' ,или Nothing ' ,или значение любого скалярного типа 'See Also: 'Example: Public property set FromPart(byval newValue as object) LoadFromDatabase if CanChange then ChangeTime=Now Changed=true OnChange "FromPart",FromPart,newvalue on error resume next m_FromPart_ID="" m_FromPart_ID=newValue.id ' set m_FromPart= newValue end if end property
'Раздел 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'Returns: ' объект любого класса Visual Basic ' ,или Nothing 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as object ' Set variable = me. FromPart public property Get FromPart() as object LoadFromDatabase AccessTime=Now dim tmp_FromPart as object if m_FromPart_ID<>"" then set tmp_FromPart=Application.FindRowObject("PART",m_FromPart_ID) if tmp_FromPart is nothing then m_FromPart_ID_BRIEF = "" else m_FromPart_ID_BRIEF = tmp_FromPart.Brief end if '''''' Speed optimization ONLY ''''''''' Application.AddToCash "PART" & m_FromPart_ID, tmp_FromPart set FromPart=tmp_FromPart exit property end if ' set FromPart = m_FromPart end property ' let 'Поле
'Поле 'Parameters: '[IN] newValue , тип параметра: object - ... 'Returns: ' объект любого класса Visual Basic ' ,или Nothing ' ,или значение любого скалярного типа 'See Also: 'Example: Public property set Field(byval newValue as object) LoadFromDatabase if CanChange then ChangeTime=Now Changed=true OnChange "Field",Field,newvalue on error resume next m_Field_ID="" m_Field_ID=newValue.id ' set m_Field= newValue end if end property
'Поле 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'Returns: ' объект любого класса Visual Basic ' ,или Nothing 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as object ' Set variable = me. Field public property Get Field() as object LoadFromDatabase AccessTime=Now dim tmp_Field as object if m_Field_ID<>"" then set tmp_Field=Application.FindRowObject("FIELD",m_Field_ID) if tmp_Field is nothing then m_Field_ID_BRIEF = "" else m_Field_ID_BRIEF = tmp_Field.Brief end if '''''' Speed optimization ONLY ''''''''' Application.AddToCash "FIELD" & m_Field_ID, tmp_Field set Field=tmp_Field exit property end if ' set Field = m_Field end property ' let 'Агрегация
'Агрегация 'Parameters: '[IN] newValue , тип параметра: enumAggregationType - ... 'Returns: ' объект любого класса Visual Basic ' ,или Nothing ' ,или значение любого скалярного типа 'See Also: 'Example: Public property let Aggregation(byval newValue as enumAggregationType) LoadFromDatabase if CanChange then ChangeTime=Now Changed=true OnChange "Aggregation",Aggregation,newvalue
m_Aggregation= newValue end if end property
'Агрегация 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'Returns: ' объект класса enumAggregationType ' ,или Nothing 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as enumAggregationType ' Set variable = me. Aggregation public property Get Aggregation() as enumAggregationType LoadFromDatabase AccessTime=Now
Aggregation = m_Aggregation end property ' let 'Формула
'Формула 'Parameters: '[IN] newValue , тип параметра: STRING - ... 'Returns: ' объект любого класса Visual Basic ' ,или Nothing ' ,или значение любого скалярного типа 'See Also: 'Example: Public property let Expression(byval newValue as STRING) LoadFromDatabase if CanChange then ChangeTime=Now Changed=true OnChange "Expression",Expression,newvalue
m_Expression= newValue end if end property
'Формула 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'Returns: ' значение типа STRING 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as STRING ' variable = me. Expression public property Get Expression() as STRING LoadFromDatabase AccessTime=Now
Expression = m_Expression end property ' let 'Для комбо
'Для комбо 'Parameters: '[IN] newValue , тип параметра: enumBoolean - ... 'Returns: ' объект любого класса Visual Basic ' ,или Nothing ' ,или значение любого скалярного типа 'See Also: 'Example: Public property let ForCombo(byval newValue as enumBoolean) LoadFromDatabase if CanChange then ChangeTime=Now Changed=true OnChange "ForCombo",ForCombo,newvalue
m_ForCombo= newValue end if end property
'Для комбо 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'Returns: ' объект класса enumBoolean ' ,или Nothing 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as enumBoolean ' Set variable = me. ForCombo public property Get ForCombo() as enumBoolean LoadFromDatabase AccessTime=Now
ForCombo = m_ForCombo end property
'Упаковать поля в именованную коллекцию 'Parameters: '[IN][OUT] nv , тип параметра: NamedValues - ... 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.Pack({параметры}) public sub Pack(byref nv as NamedValues) dim nvi as NamedValue set nv = Nothing set nv = new NamedValues
set nvi=nv.Add( "sequence",m_sequence) nvi.ValueType = adInteger set nvi=nv.Add( "Name",m_Name) nvi.ValueSize = 255 set nvi=nv.Add( "the_Alias",m_the_Alias) nvi.ValueSize = 64 ' Reference to PART if m_FromPart_ID="" then set nvi=nv.Add ("FromPart","") else set nvi=nv.Add ("FromPart",m_FromPart_ID) end if nvi.ORACLE_GUID ' Reference to FIELD if m_Field_ID="" then set nvi=nv.Add ("Field","") else set nvi=nv.Add ("Field",m_Field_ID) end if nvi.ORACLE_GUID set nvi=nv.Add( "Aggregation",m_Aggregation) nvi.ValueType = adInteger set nvi=nv.Add( "Expression",m_Expression) set nvi=nv.Add( "ForCombo",m_ForCombo) nvi.ValueType = adInteger end sub
'Краткое название строки 'Parameters: '[IN] UseServer , тип параметра: boolean = false - ... 'Returns: ' значение типа string 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as string ' variable = me. Brief(...параметры...) public function Brief( optional byval UseServer as boolean = false) as string dim s as string if Application.WorkOffline then
m_BRIEF="" m_BRIEF= m_BRIEF & Name & "; " if FromPart is nothing then m_BRIEF=m_BRIEF & "{" & m_FromPart_ID_BRIEF & "}; " else m_BRIEF=m_BRIEF & "{" & FromPart.Brief & "}; " end if select case Aggregation case AggregationType_MAX m_BRIEF=m_BRIEF & "MAX; " case AggregationType_AVG m_BRIEF=m_BRIEF & "AVG; " case AggregationType_SUM m_BRIEF=m_BRIEF & "SUM; " case AggregationType_COUNT m_BRIEF=m_BRIEF & "COUNT; " case AggregationType_MIN m_BRIEF=m_BRIEF & "MIN; " case AggregationType_CUSTOM m_BRIEF=m_BRIEF & "CUSTOM; " case AggregationType_none m_BRIEF=m_BRIEF & "none; " end select 'Aggregation BRIEF= m_BRIEF else on error goto bye if UseServer or m_Brief="" then application.MTZSession.GetBrief PartName, ID, s if len(s) > 255 then Brief = left(s,255) & "..." else Brief = s end if m_Brief = Brief else Brief = m_Brief end if end if exit function bye: Brief = "! доступ запрещен ! (" & err.description & ")" end function
'Распаковать значения полей из именованной коллекции 'Parameters: '[IN][OUT] nv , тип параметра: object - ... 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.UnPack({параметры}) public sub UnPack(byref nv as object) on error resume next if typename(nv) = "NamedValues" then
m_sequence=nv.item( "sequence").Value m_Name=nv.item( "Name").Value m_the_Alias=nv.item( "the_Alias").Value m_FromPart_ID=nv.item( "FromPart").Value m_Field_ID=nv.item( "Field").Value m_Aggregation=nv.item( "Aggregation").Value m_Expression=nv.item( "Expression").Value m_ForCombo=nv.item( "ForCombo").Value else
m_sequence=nv.fields( "sequence").Value m_Name=nv.fields( "Name").Value m_the_Alias=nv.fields( "the_Alias").Value m_FromPart_ID=nv.fields( "FromPart").Value m_Field_ID=nv.fields( "Field").Value m_Aggregation=nv.fields( "Aggregation").Value m_Expression=nv.fields( "Expression").Value m_ForCombo=nv.fields( "ForCombo").Value end if end sub
'Очистить поля 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.CleanFields() Public Sub CleanFields() dim nv as namedvalues dim o as ViewColumn set o = new ViewColumn set o.Application = me.Application set o.parent = me.parent o.pack nv unpack nv set o = nothing end sub
'Сохранить изменение 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'Returns: ' Boolean, семантика результата: ' true - ' false - 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as boolean ' variable = me.Save() Public Function Save() as boolean LoadFromDatabase if Application.WorkOffline then exit function If Not CanChangeONLine Then Exit Function dim nv as namedvalues pack nv on error goto bye application.MTZSession.SaveRow2 PartName, id, me.Parent.Parent.id ,nv,application.id Changed = false Save = true exit function bye: err.raise err.number,"ViewColumn.Save",err.description End Function
'Удалить строку 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'Returns: ' Boolean, семантика результата: ' true - ' false - 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as boolean ' variable = me.Delete() Public Function Delete() as boolean Dim i As Long, ok as boolean if Application.WorkOffline then If Not CanChangeOffLine Then Exit Function on error goto bye m_Deleted = True Delete = True else If Not CanChangeONLine Then Exit Function Delete=application.MTZSession.DeleteRow2( PartName, id, Application.ID) Changed = false 'Compact Closeclass end if exit function bye: err.raise err.number,"ViewColumn.Delete",err.description End Function
'Задать стиль защиты 'Parameters: '[IN] SecurityStyleID , тип параметра: string - ... 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.Secure({параметры}) public sub Secure(byval SecurityStyleID as string) if application.WorkOffline then exit sub On Error goto bye M_SecureStyleID =Application.MTZSession.Secure("ViewColumn" ,ID,SecurityStyleID) exit sub bye: err.raise err.number,"ViewColumn.Secure",err.description end sub
'Распространить права на дочерние строки и разделы 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.Propagate() public sub Propagate() if application.WorkOffline then exit sub Application.MTZSession.Propagate "ViewColumn", ID exit sub bye: err.raise err.number,"ViewColumn.Propagate",err.description end sub
'Деструктор 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.CloseClass() Friend sub CloseClass() on error resume next
m_FromPart_ID="" set m_FromPart= nothing m_Field_ID="" set m_Field= nothing if not Application is nothing then Application.Logger.Message "ViewColumn.CloseClass" CloseParents end sub
'Обновить 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.Refresh() Public sub Refresh() on error resume next RowRetrived = false m_Brief ="" End sub
'Загрузить из базы данных 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.LoadFromDatabase () Public sub LoadFromDatabase () on error resume next If ID="" then exit sub If Application.WorkOffline then RowRetrived = true RetriveTime = now exit sub end if dim rs as adodb.recordset If not RowRetrived then CleanFields set rs =application.MTZSession.GetRow( PartName, id) Unpack rs m_SecureStyleID = rs!SecurityStyleID RowRetrived = true RetriveTime = now end if end sub
'Найти строку раздела в дочерних объектах 'Parameters: '[IN] StrID , тип параметра: string, '[IN] InstID , тип параметра: string - ... 'Returns: ' объект любого класса Visual Basic ' ,или Nothing 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as object ' Set variable = me.FindObject(...параметры...) public function FindObject(byval StrID as string, byval InstID as string) as object dim m_FindObject as object static inFindObject as boolean if StrID = "" then exit function if InstID = "" then exit function if inFindObject then exit function inFindObject = true if StrID = PartName then if InstID = ID then set m_FindObject=me end if end if
set FindObject = m_findobject set m_FindObject = nothing inFindObject = false end function
'Оптимизировать занятую объектом память 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.Compact() public sub Compact() if not Changed then CleanFields RowRetrived = false end if
end sub
'Регистрация изменения значения строки 'Parameters: '[IN] fieldName , тип параметра: string, '[IN] OldValue,, тип параметра: Variant '[IN][OUT] NewValue, тип параметра: Variant - ... 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.OnChange({параметры}) friend sub OnChange(byval fieldName as string, byval OldValue, byref NewValue) RaiseEvent Change(fieldname,OldValue,NewValue) end sub
'Загрузить из формата XML 'Parameters: '[IN][OUT] node , тип параметра: IXMLDOMNode, '[IN] LoadMode , тип параметра: integer=0 - ... 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.XMLLoad({параметры}) public sub XMLLoad( node as IXMLDOMNode, optional byval LoadMode as integer=0) on error resume next Dim e_list As IXMLDOMNodeList Dim e_ As IXMLDOMNode if LoadMode <>2 then m_ID=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("ID").nodeValue m_Deleted=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("Deleted").nodeValue m_IsLocked=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("IsLocked").nodeValue if m_IsLocked >2 then m_IsLocked =0 m_RetriveTime=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("RetriveTime").nodeValue m_ChangeTime=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("ChangeTime").nodeValue m_AccessTime=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("AccessTime").nodeValue if Application.workoffline and m_IsLocked = LockSession then m_IsLocked = NoLock Secure node.Attributes.getNamedItem("SECURITYSTYLEID").nodeValue sequence=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("SEQUENCE").nodeValue Name=Replace(node.Attributes.getNamedItem("NAME").nodeValue,vbLf,vbcrlf) the_Alias=Replace(node.Attributes.getNamedItem("THE_ALIAS").nodeValue,vbLf,vbcrlf) set FromPart=nothing m_FromPart_ID=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("FROMPART").nodeValue m_FromPart_ID_BRIEF=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("FROMPART_BRIEF").nodeValue set Field=nothing m_Field_ID=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("FIELD").nodeValue m_Field_ID_BRIEF=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("FIELD_BRIEF").nodeValue Aggregation=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("AGGREGATION").nodeValue Expression=Replace(node.Attributes.getNamedItem("EXPRESSION").nodeValue,vbLf,vbcrlf) ForCombo=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("FORCOMBO").nodeValue on error goto bye 'if m_ChangeTime >= m_RetriveTime then m_Changed = true m_Changed = true m_RowRetrived = true m_Brief = "" on error resume next exit sub bye: debugoutput err.description end sub
'Сохранить в формате XML 'Parameters: '[IN][OUT] node , тип параметра: IXMLDOMElement, '[IN][OUT] xdom , тип параметра: DomDocument - ... 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.XMLSave({параметры}) public sub XMLSave(node as IXMLDOMElement, xdom as DomDocument) on error resume next Dim e_ As IXMLDOMElement LoadFromDatabase node.setAttribute "ID", m_ID node.setAttribute "Deleted", m_Deleted node.setAttribute "IsLocked", m_IsLocked node.setAttribute "RetriveTime", cdbl(m_RetriveTime) node.setAttribute "ChangeTime", cdbl(m_ChangeTime) node.setAttribute "SECURITYSTYLEID", m_SecureStyleID node.setAttribute "SEQUENCE", sequence node.setAttribute "NAME", Name node.setAttribute "THE_ALIAS", the_Alias node.setAttribute "FROMPART", m_FromPart_ID if not (FromPart is nothing) then node.setAttribute "FROMPART_BRIEF", FromPart.BRIEF else node.setAttribute "FROMPART_BRIEF", m_FromPart_ID_BRIEF end if node.setAttribute "FIELD", m_Field_ID if not (Field is nothing) then node.setAttribute "FIELD_BRIEF", Field.BRIEF else node.setAttribute "FIELD_BRIEF", m_Field_ID_BRIEF end if node.setAttribute "AGGREGATION", Aggregation node.setAttribute "EXPRESSION", Expression node.setAttribute "FORCOMBO", ForCombo node.setAttribute "AccessTime", cdbl(m_AccessTime) end sub
'может ли быть изменено 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'Returns: ' Boolean, семантика результата: ' true - ' false - 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as boolean ' variable = me. CanChange public property Get CanChange() as boolean if application.workoffline then CanChange = CanChangeoffLine else CanChange = canchangeonline end if end property
'может ли быть изменено в режиме Offline 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'Returns: ' Boolean, семантика результата: ' true - ' false - 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as boolean ' variable = me. CanChangeOffline public property Get CanChangeOffline() as boolean dim test as boolean if not parent is nothing then test = parent.CanChangeOffline end if if not test then test = (IsLocked = LockPermanent) end if CanChangeOffline = test end property
'может ли быть изменено в режиме ONline 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'Returns: ' Boolean, семантика результата: ' true - ' false - 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as boolean ' variable = me. CanChangeONLine public property Get CanChangeONLine() as boolean dim test as boolean if not parent is nothing then test = parent.CanChangeONLine end if if not test then test = (IsLocked < ExternalLockSession) end if CanChangeOnline = test end property
'Задать тип блокировки 'Parameters: '[IN][OUT] newIsLocked , тип параметра: LockStyle - ... 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim value as Variant ' value = ...значение... ' me. IsLocked = value friend property Let IsLocked(newIsLocked as LockStyle) m_IsLocked = newIsLocked end property
'Текущий тип блокировки 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'Returns: ' объект класса LockStyle ' ,или Nothing 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as LockStyle ' Set variable = me. IsLocked public property Get IsLocked() as LockStyle if m_IsLocked <> LockSession and m_IsLocked <> LockPermanent then CheckLock IsLocked = m_IsLocked end property
'Проверить блокировку 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.CheckLock() private sub CheckLock() static LastCheckTime as date if application.WorkOffline then exit sub If Now - LastCheckTime < CDbl(CDate("00:00:10")) Then Exit Sub On Error Resume Next m_IsLocked = Application.MTZSession.IsLocked("ViewColumn", ID) LastCheckTime = now end sub
'Заблокировать 'Parameters: '[IN] Permanent , тип параметра: boolean=false - ... 'Returns: ' Boolean, семантика результата: ' true - ' false - 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as boolean ' variable = me.LockResource(...параметры...) public function LockResource(optional byval Permanent as boolean=false ) as boolean if application.WorkOffline then exit function dim OK ok = Application.MTZSession.LockResource("ViewColumn", ID, Permanent) if OK then if Permanent then m_IsLocked = LockPermanent else m_IsLocked = LockSession else m_IsLocked = NoLock end if bye: end function
'Снять блокировку ресурса 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'Returns: ' Boolean, семантика результата: ' true - ' false - 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as boolean ' variable = me.UnLockResource() public function UnLockResource() as boolean if application.WorkOffline then exit function On Error GoTo bye Application.MTZSession.UnlockResource "ViewColumn", ID m_IsLocked = NoLock bye: end function
'Возможно блокирование 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'Returns: ' Boolean, семантика результата: ' true - ' false - 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as boolean ' variable = me.CanLock() public function CanLock() as boolean if application.WorkOffline then exit function On Error Resume Next CanLock = Application.MTZSession.CanLock("ViewColumn",ID) end function
'Массовое обновление измененных строк 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.BatchUpdate() PUBLIC sub BatchUpdate() If not Application.WorkOffline Then If Deleted Then Delete Exit Sub End If If Changed Then Save End If End sub
'Загрузить все данные документа из базы 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.LoadAll() friend sub LoadAll() If not Application.WorkOffline Then LoadFromDatabase End If End sub
'Раскрытие раздела при выборе узла в глобальном дереве 'Parameters: '[IN][OUT] tree , тип параметра: object, '[IN] key , тип параметра: string, '[IN] mode , тип параметра: string, '[IN][OUT] optional Mask , тип параметра: string = "" - ... 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.Expand({параметры}) public sub Expand(tree as object,byval key as string, byval mode as string, optional Mask as string = "") dim id as string , struct as string, child as string dim item as object, i as long, nid as string, tmpid as string dim tidx as long, tid as string 'only for tree styled structure on error resume next id = mid(key,39,38) struct = right(tree.nodes.item(key).parent.parent.key,len(tree.nodes.item(key).parent.parent.key)-76) child = right(key,len(key)-76) if id<>m_id then exit sub else set item =me end if tree.nodes.item(key).sorted=true if mode="" then select case child end select end if ' mode="" (Default) end sub

'строка раздела private m_ID as string private m_SecureStyleID as string private m_RowRetrived as boolean private m_Changed as boolean private m_Deleted as boolean private m_RetriveTime as date private m_ChangeTime as date private m_AccessTime as date private m_Parent as Object private m_Application as Application private m_TheView as object Dim m_TheView_ID as string Dim m_TheView_ID_BRIEF as string private m_TheJoinSource as object Dim m_TheJoinSource_ID as string Dim m_TheJoinSource_ID_BRIEF as string private m_RefType as enumJournalLinkType private m_TheJoinDestination as object Dim m_TheJoinDestination_ID as string Dim m_TheJoinDestination_ID_BRIEF as string private m_HandJoin as String private m_SEQ as long private m_Brief as string

'Задать Дату и время изменения 'Parameters: '[IN][OUT] newChangeTime , тип параметра: date - ... 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim value as Variant ' value = ...значение... ' me. ChangeTime = value friend property Let ChangeTime(newChangeTime as date) m_ChangeTime = newChangeTime end property
'Получить Дату и время изменения 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'Returns: ' значение типа date 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as date ' variable = me. ChangeTime public property Get ChangeTime() as date ChangeTime = m_ChangeTime end property
'Задать время обращения 'Parameters: '[IN][OUT] newAccessTime , тип параметра: date - ... 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim value as Variant ' value = ...значение... ' me. AccessTime = value friend property Let AccessTime(newAccessTime as date) m_AccessTime = newAccessTime if m_AccessTime <= m_RetriveTime then m_AccessTime = m_RetriveTime +0.001 end property
'Получить время обращения 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'Returns: ' значение типа date 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as date ' variable = me. AccessTime public property Get AccessTime() as date AccessTime = m_AccessTime end property private function GetFromXML(ByVal XML as string, ByVal TagName as string) as string Dim res As String On Error GoTo err Dim XMLDoc As New DOMDocument Call XMLDoc.loadXML(XML) Dim Node As MSXML2.IXMLDOMNode For Each Node In XMLDoc.childNodes.item(0).childNodes If (UCase(Node.baseName) = "BRIEF") Then res = Node.Text Exit For End If Next err: GetFromXML = res End function ' let 'Представление

'Порядок 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'Returns: ' значение типа long 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as long ' variable = me. SEQ public property Get SEQ() as long LoadFromDatabase AccessTime=Now
SEQ = m_SEQ end property
'Упаковать поля в именованную коллекцию 'Parameters: '[IN][OUT] nv , тип параметра: NamedValues - ... 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.Pack({параметры}) public sub Pack(byref nv as NamedValues) dim nvi as NamedValue set nv = Nothing set nv = new NamedValues
' Reference to PARTVIEW if m_TheView_ID="" then set nvi=nv.Add ("TheView","") else set nvi=nv.Add ("TheView",m_TheView_ID) end if nvi.ORACLE_GUID ' Reference to ViewColumn if m_TheJoinSource_ID="" then set nvi=nv.Add ("TheJoinSource","") else set nvi=nv.Add ("TheJoinSource",m_TheJoinSource_ID) end if nvi.ORACLE_GUID set nvi=nv.Add( "RefType",m_RefType) nvi.ValueType = adInteger ' Reference to ViewColumn if m_TheJoinDestination_ID="" then set nvi=nv.Add ("TheJoinDestination","") else set nvi=nv.Add ("TheJoinDestination",m_TheJoinDestination_ID) end if nvi.ORACLE_GUID set nvi=nv.Add( "HandJoin",m_HandJoin) nvi.ValueSize = 255 set nvi=nv.Add( "SEQ",m_SEQ) nvi.ValueType = adInteger end sub
'Краткое название строки 'Parameters: '[IN] UseServer , тип параметра: boolean = false - ... 'Returns: ' значение типа string 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as string ' variable = me. Brief(...параметры...) public function Brief( optional byval UseServer as boolean = false) as string dim s as string if Application.WorkOffline then
m_BRIEF="" if TheView is nothing then m_BRIEF=m_BRIEF & "{" & m_TheView_ID_BRIEF & "}; " else m_BRIEF=m_BRIEF & "{" & TheView.Brief & "}; " end if BRIEF= m_BRIEF else on error goto bye if UseServer or m_Brief="" then application.MTZSession.GetBrief PartName, ID, s if len(s) > 255 then Brief = left(s,255) & "..." else Brief = s end if m_Brief = Brief else Brief = m_Brief end if end if exit function bye: Brief = "! доступ запрещен ! (" & err.description & ")" end function
'Распаковать значения полей из именованной коллекции 'Parameters: '[IN][OUT] nv , тип параметра: object - ... 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.UnPack({параметры}) public sub UnPack(byref nv as object) on error resume next if typename(nv) = "NamedValues" then
m_TheView_ID=nv.item( "TheView").Value m_TheJoinSource_ID=nv.item( "TheJoinSource").Value m_RefType=nv.item( "RefType").Value m_TheJoinDestination_ID=nv.item( "TheJoinDestination").Value m_HandJoin=nv.item( "HandJoin").Value m_SEQ=nv.item( "SEQ").Value else
m_TheView_ID=nv.fields( "TheView").Value m_TheJoinSource_ID=nv.fields( "TheJoinSource").Value m_RefType=nv.fields( "RefType").Value m_TheJoinDestination_ID=nv.fields( "TheJoinDestination").Value m_HandJoin=nv.fields( "HandJoin").Value m_SEQ=nv.fields( "SEQ").Value end if end sub
'Очистить поля 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.CleanFields() Public Sub CleanFields() dim nv as namedvalues dim o as PARTVIEW_LNK set o = new PARTVIEW_LNK set o.Application = me.Application set o.parent = me.parent o.pack nv unpack nv set o = nothing end sub
'Сохранить изменение 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'Returns: ' Boolean, семантика результата: ' true - ' false - 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as boolean ' variable = me.Save() Public Function Save() as boolean LoadFromDatabase if Application.WorkOffline then exit function If Not CanChangeONLine Then Exit Function dim nv as namedvalues pack nv on error goto bye application.MTZSession.SaveRow2 PartName, id, me.Parent.Parent.id ,nv,application.id Changed = false Save = true exit function bye: err.raise err.number,"PARTVIEW_LNK.Save",err.description End Function
'Удалить строку 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'Returns: ' Boolean, семантика результата: ' true - ' false - 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as boolean ' variable = me.Delete() Public Function Delete() as boolean Dim i As Long, ok as boolean if Application.WorkOffline then If Not CanChangeOffLine Then Exit Function on error goto bye m_Deleted = True Delete = True else If Not CanChangeONLine Then Exit Function Delete=application.MTZSession.DeleteRow2( PartName, id, Application.ID) Changed = false 'Compact Closeclass end if exit function bye: err.raise err.number,"PARTVIEW_LNK.Delete",err.description End Function
'Задать стиль защиты 'Parameters: '[IN] SecurityStyleID , тип параметра: string - ... 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.Secure({параметры}) public sub Secure(byval SecurityStyleID as string) if application.WorkOffline then exit sub On Error goto bye M_SecureStyleID =Application.MTZSession.Secure("PARTVIEW_LNK" ,ID,SecurityStyleID) exit sub bye: err.raise err.number,"PARTVIEW_LNK.Secure",err.description end sub
'Распространить права на дочерние строки и разделы 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.Propagate() public sub Propagate() if application.WorkOffline then exit sub Application.MTZSession.Propagate "PARTVIEW_LNK", ID exit sub bye: err.raise err.number,"PARTVIEW_LNK.Propagate",err.description end sub
'Деструктор 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.CloseClass() Friend sub CloseClass() on error resume next
m_TheView_ID="" set m_TheView= nothing m_TheJoinSource_ID="" set m_TheJoinSource= nothing m_TheJoinDestination_ID="" set m_TheJoinDestination= nothing if not Application is nothing then Application.Logger.Message "PARTVIEW_LNK.CloseClass" CloseParents end sub
'Обновить 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.Refresh() Public sub Refresh() on error resume next RowRetrived = false m_Brief ="" End sub
'Загрузить из базы данных 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.LoadFromDatabase () Public sub LoadFromDatabase () on error resume next If ID="" then exit sub If Application.WorkOffline then RowRetrived = true RetriveTime = now exit sub end if dim rs as adodb.recordset If not RowRetrived then CleanFields set rs =application.MTZSession.GetRow( PartName, id) Unpack rs m_SecureStyleID = rs!SecurityStyleID RowRetrived = true RetriveTime = now end if end sub
'Найти строку раздела в дочерних объектах 'Parameters: '[IN] StrID , тип параметра: string, '[IN] InstID , тип параметра: string - ... 'Returns: ' объект любого класса Visual Basic ' ,или Nothing 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as object ' Set variable = me.FindObject(...параметры...) public function FindObject(byval StrID as string, byval InstID as string) as object dim m_FindObject as object static inFindObject as boolean if StrID = "" then exit function if InstID = "" then exit function if inFindObject then exit function inFindObject = true if StrID = PartName then if InstID = ID then set m_FindObject=me end if end if
set FindObject = m_findobject set m_FindObject = nothing inFindObject = false end function
'Оптимизировать занятую объектом память 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.Compact() public sub Compact() if not Changed then CleanFields RowRetrived = false end if
end sub
'Регистрация изменения значения строки 'Parameters: '[IN] fieldName , тип параметра: string, '[IN] OldValue,, тип параметра: Variant '[IN][OUT] NewValue, тип параметра: Variant - ... 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.OnChange({параметры}) friend sub OnChange(byval fieldName as string, byval OldValue, byref NewValue) RaiseEvent Change(fieldname,OldValue,NewValue) end sub
'Загрузить из формата XML 'Parameters: '[IN][OUT] node , тип параметра: IXMLDOMNode, '[IN] LoadMode , тип параметра: integer=0 - ... 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.XMLLoad({параметры}) public sub XMLLoad( node as IXMLDOMNode, optional byval LoadMode as integer=0) on error resume next Dim e_list As IXMLDOMNodeList Dim e_ As IXMLDOMNode if LoadMode <>2 then m_ID=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("ID").nodeValue m_Deleted=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("Deleted").nodeValue m_IsLocked=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("IsLocked").nodeValue if m_IsLocked >2 then m_IsLocked =0 m_RetriveTime=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("RetriveTime").nodeValue m_ChangeTime=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("ChangeTime").nodeValue m_AccessTime=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("AccessTime").nodeValue if Application.workoffline and m_IsLocked = LockSession then m_IsLocked = NoLock Secure node.Attributes.getNamedItem("SECURITYSTYLEID").nodeValue set TheView=nothing m_TheView_ID=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("THEVIEW").nodeValue m_TheView_ID_BRIEF=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("THEVIEW_BRIEF").nodeValue set TheJoinSource=nothing m_TheJoinSource_ID=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("THEJOINSOURCE").nodeValue m_TheJoinSource_ID_BRIEF=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("THEJOINSOURCE_BRIEF").nodeValue RefType=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("REFTYPE").nodeValue set TheJoinDestination=nothing m_TheJoinDestination_ID=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("THEJOINDESTINATION").nodeValue m_TheJoinDestination_ID_BRIEF=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("THEJOINDESTINATION_BRIEF").nodeValue HandJoin=Replace(node.Attributes.getNamedItem("HANDJOIN").nodeValue,vbLf,vbcrlf) SEQ=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("SEQ").nodeValue on error goto bye 'if m_ChangeTime >= m_RetriveTime then m_Changed = true m_Changed = true m_RowRetrived = true m_Brief = "" on error resume next exit sub bye: debugoutput err.description end sub
'Сохранить в формате XML 'Parameters: '[IN][OUT] node , тип параметра: IXMLDOMElement, '[IN][OUT] xdom , тип параметра: DomDocument - ... 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.XMLSave({параметры}) public sub XMLSave(node as IXMLDOMElement, xdom as DomDocument) on error resume next Dim e_ As IXMLDOMElement LoadFromDatabase node.setAttribute "ID", m_ID node.setAttribute "Deleted", m_Deleted node.setAttribute "IsLocked", m_IsLocked node.setAttribute "RetriveTime", cdbl(m_RetriveTime) node.setAttribute "ChangeTime", cdbl(m_ChangeTime) node.setAttribute "SECURITYSTYLEID", m_SecureStyleID node.setAttribute "THEVIEW", m_TheView_ID if not (TheView is nothing) then node.setAttribute "THEVIEW_BRIEF", TheView.BRIEF else node.setAttribute "THEVIEW_BRIEF", m_TheView_ID_BRIEF end if node.setAttribute "THEJOINSOURCE", m_TheJoinSource_ID if not (TheJoinSource is nothing) then node.setAttribute "THEJOINSOURCE_BRIEF", TheJoinSource.BRIEF else node.setAttribute "THEJOINSOURCE_BRIEF", m_TheJoinSource_ID_BRIEF end if node.setAttribute "REFTYPE", RefType node.setAttribute "THEJOINDESTINATION", m_TheJoinDestination_ID if not (TheJoinDestination is nothing) then node.setAttribute "THEJOINDESTINATION_BRIEF", TheJoinDestination.BRIEF else node.setAttribute "THEJOINDESTINATION_BRIEF", m_TheJoinDestination_ID_BRIEF end if node.setAttribute "HANDJOIN", HandJoin node.setAttribute "SEQ", SEQ node.setAttribute "AccessTime", cdbl(m_AccessTime) end sub
